description.value:
Your magic can be mistaken for mechanized feats of wonder. While under the effect of Innate Sorcery you gain the following additional benefits:

  • When a creature makes a Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution saving throw against your Sorcerer spells, they must use the saving throw with the lowest modifier.
  • When a creature makes a Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma saving throw against your Sorcerer spells, they must use the saving throw with the lowest modifier.
